ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package truRoots® Ancient Grains Organic Penne
½ cup prepared fresh basil pesto
1 pint grape or cherry tomatoes, halved
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
4 sprigs Fresh basil sprigs, for garnish

cookingTips: Cool pasta completely before adding pesto to prevent it from breaking down
Mix pesto with pasta while warm to help absorption, then chill
Add mozzarella and tomatoes just before serving to maintain their texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I keep the pesto flavor vibrant and prevent the mozzarella from getting mushy?
